analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x65ab08a98ee099df1053137b69ce1cf47f8926b2.sol:
	Contract SuissmarkToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x65ab08a98ee099df1053137b69ce1cf47f8926b2.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x65ab08a98ee099df1053137b69ce1cf47f8926b2.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
